author: craigmcc
msg: Backport making WarpConnector's thread a daemon to facilitate shutting

author: craigmcc
msg: Make the WARP connector's thread a daemon thread so that Tomcat shutdown
still works without a System.exit(0) call in Bootstrap.java.
Pier, you will need to port this change to the j-t-c repository version!
